data.comment: The match has started.
Masaaki Toma signals a Urawa throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 1, Urawa are coming forward and Quenten Martinus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 3, Sendai have a goal kick.
Urawa to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 5, Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Tomoya Ugajin of Urawa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Sendai.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal! Kazuki Nagasawa gives Urawa a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Koya Yuruki.
Masaaki Toma awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 14, Sendai's Ryutaro Iio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Urawa in the half of Sendai.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 18, Free kick Sendai.
Sendai's Wataru Tanaka breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 23, In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Urawa's Tomoya Ugajin has been booked in Saitama.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Sendai to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Can Sendai capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Urawa.
Masaaki Toma signals a Sendai throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 34, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Hisashi Appiah Tawiah (Sendai) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 35, Sendai needs to be cautious. Urawa have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Sendai.
Goal! Quenten Martinus extends Urawa's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 38, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Urawa.
Jakub Slowik for Sendai has been booked by Masaaki Toma and receives a first yellow card.
Urawa are going well in Saitama. They now lead 3-0 thanks to a Shinzo Koroki penalty.
In the minute 40, The away team replace Takahiro Yanagi with Koji Hachisuka.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 44, Masaaki Toma awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Sendai.
Masaaki Toma will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Yuki Muto for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Masaaki Toma awards Sendai a goal kick.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Saitama.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Urawa.
In the minute 46, Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yoshiki Matsushita is on a sub for Keiya Shiihashi for Sendai.
Takayoshi Ishihara of Sendai gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
In the minute 48, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In Saitama Sendai attack through Alexandre Guedes. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 50, Sendai to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Masaaki Toma awards Urawa a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Urawa move into a 4-0 lead through a Shinzo Koroki header.
Koya Yuruki with an assist there.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Urawa close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Saitama.
In the minute 53, Urawa make their first substitution with Leonardo replacing Shinzo Koroki.
Ryosuke Yamanaka is replacing Tomoya Ugajin for the home team.
In the minute 54, Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Sendai.
Masaaki Toma signals a throw-in for Urawa, close to Sendai's area.
In the minute 59, Takashi Kiyama is making the team's third substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Shun Nagasawa replacing Isaac Cuenca.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Masaaki Toma signals a Sendai throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 61, Sendai have a dangerous throw-in.
Shun Nagasawa's header is off-target for Sendai.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Urawa's Leonardo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
Urawa's Ewerton misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Urawa's Quenten Martinus is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 67, Great finish from Leonardo to give Urawa a 5-0 lead.
Great play from Quenten Martinus to set up the goal.
The home team replace Yuki Muto with Kenyu Sugimoto.
In the minute 69, Tsuyoshi Otsuki (Urawa) is making a fourth substitution, with Kai Shibato replacing Ewerton.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Sendai at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Kunimitsu Sekiguchi is replacing Ryohei Michibuchi for the away team.
Hiroto Yamada is replacing Alexandre Guedes for Sendai at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Masaaki Toma awards Urawa a goal kick.
Urawa make their fifth substitution with Takahiro Sekine replacing Quenten Martinus.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Urawa.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 81, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Sendai are coming forward and Shun Nagasawa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Goal! Urawa extend their lead to 6-0 through Leonardo.
In the minute 86, Daiki Hashioka instrumental with a fine assist.
Urawa drives forward and Leonardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Urawa drive upfield and Leonardo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sendai defender.
At Saitama Stadium 2002 the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the match. The final score is 6-0.
